data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Generic target model (core calendars + plugin/custom subjects)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
